alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 12:25PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ONONDAGA...SOUTHERN ONEIDA...MADISON...AND NORTHERN ONEIDA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1225 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Taberg to 8 miles south of Fair Haven Beach State Park and moving east at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Syracuse, Clay, Rome, Cicero, Lysander, Van Buren, Oneida, Baldwinsville, North Syracuse and Solvay. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 near 33, and between 34A and 39. New York Interstate 81 between 17 and 30. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida
